title: Inquiry on Trudeau Using Emergency Powers on Trucker Protests Begins
description: Lawyers for the Canadian government and opponents clashed on whether the government had been justified in using the powers during protests that paralyzed Ottawa last February.
dc:creator: Norimitsu Onishi
media:credit: Sean Kilpatrick/The Canadian Press, via Associated Press
media:description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada this month at the House of Commons on Parliament Hill in Ottawa.
